plot: After apparently consuming poison blowfish, Homer is told that he only has 24 hours to live.

After the family have visited the Happy Sumo sushi restaurant, Homer is led to believe that he has eaten a poisonous fugu fish and will be dead by the next day. He therefore makes a list of all the things he must do such as making his peace with his father and insulting Burns,which gets him sacked. Preparing to die, he falls asleep listening to a tape of Larry King reading the Bible but next morning wakes up to find he was not poisoned after all.—don @ minifie-1

Lisa encourages the family to try a new Sushi restaurant in Springfield, and Homer, to his surprise, finds that he likes it. Wanting to try everything on the menu, he insists on ordering Fugu, and ends up getting it from a cook who is not trained in its preparation. Homer then learns that he may have been poisoned, and if that is so, he has 24 hours to live.
